type.description:
The gschema-overrides module can be used for including system-setting overrides for GTK-based desktop environments.
https://blue-build.org/reference/modules/gschema-overrides/

no-cache.description:
Whether to disabling caching for this layer.
https://blue-build.org/reference/module/#no-cache-optional

include.description: Gschema override files to test and copy to the correct place.
